   Michele Bachmann
   stated on August 27, 2012 in a Fox News interview:
   "A report just came out that if we continue with President Obama's
   policies, we're looking at over 9 percent unemployment next year in the
   fourth quarter."

"A report just came out that if we continue with President Obama's
   policies, we're looking at over 9 percent unemployment next year in the
   fourth quarter," Bachmann told host Sean Hannity in the Aug. 27, 2012,
   interview in Tampa.

Our ruling

   Bachmann said, "a report just came out that if we continue with President
   Obama's policies, we're looking at over 9 percent unemployment next year
   in the fourth quarter."

The 9 percent unemployment figure is mentioned in the CBO study, but it is
   inaccurate for Bachmann to say it is under Obama's policies.
